title: How many gigafactories need to be built in order to supply every human on Earth with one Tesla electric vehicle each? How much will that cost in 2020 dollars? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since everyone will not need a new car at the same time, you have to tell us over what time span this miracle of production needs to be carried out. 1 year. 10 years. 1 Month. 1 day? Assume each factory can make one vehicle per minute then you can do the math pretty easily yourself. But without a time factor, this is an unanswerable question.

1 factory over a long period or many factories over a short period. 1 vehicle each is a bit overkill, especially when the idea is to have robo taxis. You would kill the business model if every one has a car.
